accountingBook.externalId.description: Period end journals are book-specific, and this field shows the accounting book for the period end journal.
accountingBook.externalId.name: accountingBook.externalId

accountingBook.internalId.description: Period end journals are book-specific, and this field shows the accounting book for the period end journal.

accountingBook.name.description: Period end journals are book-specific, and this field shows the accounting book for the period end journal.
accountingBook.name.name: accountingBook.name

creditTotal.description: This is the total required to balance the lines in the list below.
creditTotal.name: creditTotal

currency.externalId.description: This is the Subsidiary's base currency.
currency.externalId.name: currency.externalId

currency.name.description: This is the Subsidiary's base currency.

debitTotal.description: This is the total required to balance the lines in the list below.
debitTotal.name: debitTotal

department.externalId.description: The value for this field is displayed only when the Create Period End Journals by Segment subsidiary preference is checked and only for period end journals created for this segment.
department.externalId.name: department.externalId

department.internalId.description: The value for this field is displayed only when the Create Period End Journals by Segment subsidiary preference is checked and only for period end journals created for this segment.
department.internalId.name: department.internalId

department.name.description: The value for this field is displayed only when the Create Period End Journals by Segment subsidiary preference is checked and only for period end journals created for this segment.
department.name.name: department.name

location.externalId.description: The value for this field is displayed only when the Create Period End Journals by Segment subsidiary preference is checked and only for period end journals created for this segment.
location.externalId.name: location.externalId

location.internalId.description: The value for this field is displayed only when the Create Period End Journals by Segment subsidiary preference is checked and only for period end journals created for this segment.
location.internalId.name: location.internalId

location.name.description: The value for this field is displayed only when the Create Period End Journals by Segment subsidiary preference is checked and only for period end journals created for this segment.
location.name.name: location.name

mainAccount.externalId.description: This account is the account for the Subsidiary that all the following lines post to. In a search of period end journals, this is Account (Main).Depending on the type of period end journal, the main account may be one of the following:    * Cumulative Translation Adjustment    * Retained Earnings    * an income summary profit or loss account    * a balance sheet closing or opening accountWhich income summary and balance sheet accounts are used is determined by your subsidiary preferences.
mainAccount.externalId.name: mainAccount.externalId

mainAccount.internalId.description: This account is the account for the Subsidiary that all the following lines post to. In a search of period end journals, this is Account (Main).Depending on the type of period end journal, the main account may be one of the following:    * Cumulative Translation Adjustment    * Retained Earnings    * an income summary profit or loss account    * a balance sheet closing or opening accountWhich income summary and balance sheet accounts are used is determined by your subsidiary preferences.
mainAccount.internalId.name: mainAccount.internalId

mainAccount.name.description: This account is the account for the Subsidiary that all the following lines post to. In a search of period end journals, this is Account (Main).Depending on the type of period end journal, the main account may be one of the following:    * Cumulative Translation Adjustment    * Retained Earnings    * an income summary profit or loss account    * a balance sheet closing or opening accountWhich income summary and balance sheet accounts are used is determined by your subsidiary preferences.
mainAccount.name.name: mainAccount.name

memo.description: Enter information to help you identify this journal in a list of other period end journal entries. The value in this field is displayed on the Period End Journal Entries list page.If you enter a value in the Memo field when you create period end journals, that value is copied to this field.
memo.name: memo

postingPeriod.externalId.description: This is the period for which you ran the Create Period End Journal Entries task.
postingPeriod.externalId.name: postingPeriod.externalId

postingPeriod.internalId.description: This is the period for which you ran the Create Period End Journal Entries task.
postingPeriod.internalId.name: postingPeriod.internalId

postingPeriod.name.description: This is the period for which you ran the Create Period End Journal Entries task.
postingPeriod.name.name: postingPeriod.name

sourceSubsidiary.externalId.description: The Source Subsidiary is the child subsidiary when posting consolidation journals and when posting income statement closing and balance sheet closing journals for the child subsidiary in the parent subsidiary. The child subsidiary does not need to have the Period End Journal Entries feature enabled.The Subsidiary is the same as the Source Subsidiary only when posting non-consolidated income statement closing and balance sheet closing journals for each subsidiary's year end.
sourceSubsidiary.externalId.name: sourceSubsidiary.externalId

sourceSubsidiary.internalId.description: The Source Subsidiary is the child subsidiary when posting consolidation journals and when posting income statement closing and balance sheet closing journals for the child subsidiary in the parent subsidiary. The child subsidiary does not need to have the Period End Journal Entries feature enabled.The Subsidiary is the same as the Source Subsidiary only when posting non-consolidated income statement closing and balance sheet closing journals for each subsidiary's year end.
sourceSubsidiary.internalId.name: sourceSubsidiary.internalId

sourceSubsidiary.name.description: The Source Subsidiary is the child subsidiary when posting consolidation journals and when posting income statement closing and balance sheet closing journals for the child subsidiary in the parent subsidiary. The child subsidiary does not need to have the Period End Journal Entries feature enabled.The Subsidiary is the same as the Source Subsidiary only when posting non-consolidated income statement closing and balance sheet closing journals for each subsidiary's year end.
sourceSubsidiary.name.name: sourceSubsidiary.name

subsidiary.externalId.description: The Subsidiary is the subsidiary to which the period end journal posts. The subsidiary must have the Enable Period End Journal Entries box checked.
subsidiary.externalId.name: subsidiary.externalId

subsidiary.internalId.description: The Subsidiary is the subsidiary to which the period end journal posts. The subsidiary must have the Enable Period End Journal Entries box checked.
subsidiary.internalId.name: subsidiary.internalId

subsidiary.name.description: The Subsidiary is the subsidiary to which the period end journal posts. The subsidiary must have the Enable Period End Journal Entries box checked.
subsidiary.name.name: subsidiary.name

tranId.description: This is the document number. It is automatically generated when the record is saved.
tranId.name: tranId

trandate.description: The Date is the last day of the accounting period, with one exception. For the Balance Sheet Closing Reversal, if applicable, the date is the first day of the period following the fiscal year end.
trandate.name: trandate

type.value.description: Period end journals are book-specific, and this field shows the accounting book for the period end journal.
type.value.name: type.value
